bug.author: aigagror
bug.summary: RGB to YUV: Conflicting information between example and description
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/rgb_to_yuv>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/rgb_to_yuv</denchmark-link>
The documentation says this function is only well defined if the values are between 0 and 1, but the example uses an input with values greater than 1.

comments.comment: Hi, Can I create a PR to fix this? Thank you!

PR to fix this issue is here, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/41565>#41565</denchmark-link>
Please take a look, thank you!

This was resolved in with this PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/42270>#42270</denchmark-link> . Please check the page here <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/rgb_to_yuv?version=nightly>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/rgb_to_yuv?version=nightly</denchmark-link>
I am closing this issue as this was already resolved. Thanks!
